trends: There have been 78 other sightings in Oklahoma City
There were no other sightings in Oklahoma City on or around February 22nd 2012
Summary: in car, look up see rectangular craft. was still, then moved.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way back home from curch on wensday.We were at a stop light when i looked in to the sky and noticed a long rectangle shape in the sky,this had lights all around it and one bigger white light that looked to be a spot light. My first thaught was a cell tower of some type. but then the object started to move to the right of me, then to the left much faster than the first movment was. I was very excited , my hart was pounding. The craft seemed to follow the car for baout 3 sec. or so.
